We’re sad to already have seen DMEXCO 2023 come and go, as we always enjoy meeting with our customers, partners, and industry peers. This year was no exception — our booth was buzzing at all times! We had more than 100 pre-booked meetings and welcomed many ad-hoc guests to discuss how we can support them on their path to creating perfect product content journeys. Both our CEO Vincent Peters and CIO Marcel Hollerbach had a full house for their sessions on the future of P2C (Product-to-Consumer) and the use of AI in social commerce.

Watch now

Productsup was on the agenda of DMEXCO 2023 with corporate lectures from our CEO Vincent Peters and Co-Founder Marcel Hollerbach. Watch the recordings of their sessions now!
